variables.routesUnion: [if(contains(variables('locations'), tolower(parameters('location'))), union(variables('routesNIP'), variables('routesJumpboxes'), variables('routesSAW'), variables('routesRunners'), variables('routesDSMS'), variables(parameters('location')).controlPlane, variables(parameters('location')).controlPlane_SqlManagementTag, variables(parameters('location')).runners, variables(parameters('location')).DSMS), union(variables('routesNIP'), variables('routesJumpboxes'), variables('routesSAW'), variables('routesRunners')))]
